ygData.msgSnippet: I have heard of this Megatron. He is repellious. My goal is to get him stopped. I had been sent by The preadacon council to claim this war for a Preadacon

 "I have heard of this Megatron. He is repellious. My goal is to get him 
stopped. I had been sent by The preadacon council to claim this war for a 
Preadacon victory. But not to disrupt time. Unfortunatly I have heard nothing 
from them since I entered earth. I fear the worst...."
